Sara Alberola

Web developer

Hello!

I am Sara Alberola, an enthusiastic web developer from Valencia, Spain.

I am passionate about sewing, traveling, and learning new things.

I’m looking for challenging opportunities to extend my knowledge while at the same time gathering experience in my field.

My Skills

PROGRAMMING

During my university years, I did an HTML and CSS course during my free time. After that, I programmed the student's representative association web page.

Years later, during my Erasmus year, I worked during the summer developing an Android application, I enjoyed the experience so much that I decided that I wanted to work as a programmer! I started looking for web development jobs, so I moved to Madrid to pursue my dream (even though I wasn't done with my studies). I started working as a web developer for the space industry using frameworks like GWT, Vaadin, and Spring

After finishing my degree, I started a Master's degree in Web applications development, which I will finish by the end of 2021!

In my spare time I have also attended some courses and bootcamps to work on my frontend development skills.

LANGUAGES

I was born in Quatretonda, a small town in Valencia, Spain. My mother languages are Valenciano and Spanish

I have studied and worked in the USA, UK, and Ireland, and right now I am studying English in my free time for the IELTS

SEWING

On my free time I like to sew.

I taught myself how to sew, but I decided to go a bit further and I decided to study and pursue some certifications like BurdaStyle's Teaching Certification, BurdaStyle's Teaching Certification Advanced, and Sistema Marti's Haute Couture certification diploma
